name: biblatex-csl-converter
description: a set of converters: biblatex => json, json => biblatex, json => CSL
author: Johannes Wilm

scripts.precompile: rimraf lib/* && BABEL_ENV=production babel --out-dir lib/edtf node_modules/edtf && BABEL_ENV=production babel --out-dir lib src
scripts.compile: npm run compile_gh-pages && npm run compile_browser
scripts.compile_browser: npm run compile_browser-export-biblatex && npm run compile_browser-export-csl && npm run compile_browser-import-biblatex
scripts.compile_browser-export-biblatex: browserify src/build/browser-export-biblatex.js -t babelify -t uglifyify | uglifyjs -c > browser/export-biblatex.js
scripts.compile_browser-export-csl: browserify src/build/browser-export-csl.js -t babelify -t uglifyify | uglifyjs -c > browser/export-csl.js
scripts.compile_browser-import-biblatex: browserify src/build/browser-import-bibtex.js -t babelify -t uglifyify | uglifyjs -c > browser/import-bibtex.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run check_js && npm run compile
scripts.coveralls: jscoverage lib && YOURPACKAGE_COVERAGE=1 nodeunit --reporter=lcov test | coveralls
